titleInfo.title: Letter from Hannah Morey to James M. Morey

subject.topic: American Civil War, letters and diaries

mods.abstract: "Dear Son... Wish you could hear Dora and Charly sing. There's a light in the window for thee, brother. It would make you cry, at least it does me. You ask me not to grieve myself sick for you. I must weep for all the mental and physical sufferings"
